languages.text: "Надеюсь, вы не собираетесь терпеть это оскорбление династии?" {n}Сенешаль в ярости взирает на толпу перед вами.{/n}
"I hope you don't plan on letting this insult to your house slide!" {n}Abelard is glaring at the crowd before you, furious.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Надеюсь, вы не собираетесь терпеть это оскорбление династии?" {n}Сенешаль в ярости взирает на толпу перед вами.{/n}

"I hope you don't plan on letting this insult to your house slide!" {n}Abelard is glaring at the crowd before you, furious.{/n}

languages.text: 「家系を侮辱されたままでよろしいのですか！」{n}アベラルドは目の前の観客を睨みつけ、激高した。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I hope you don't plan on letting this insult to your house slide!" {n}Abelard is glaring at the crowd before you, furious.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「家系を侮辱されたままでよろしいのですか！」{n}アベラルドは目の前の観客を睨みつけ、激高した。{/n}

languages.text: “他们在侮辱您的家族，我希望您不会容忍这种侮辱！”{n}阿贝拉德怒气冲冲地瞪着你面前的人群。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I hope you don't plan on letting this insult to your house slide!" {n}Abelard is glaring at the crowd before you, furious.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “他们在侮辱您的家族，我希望您不会容忍这种侮辱！”{n}阿贝拉德怒气冲冲地瞪着你面前的人群。{/n}

languages.text: «¡Espero que no deje impune este insulto a su casa!». {n}Abelard mira furioso a la multitud que tienes delante.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I hope you don't plan on letting this insult to your house slide!" {n}Abelard is glaring at the crowd before you, furious.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Espero que no deje impune este insulto a su casa!». {n}Abelard mira furioso a la multitud que tienes delante.{/n}

languages.text: « J'espère que vous ne comptez pas laisser passer cette insulte faite à votre maison ! » {n}s'exclame Abélard en regardant la foule d'un air furieux.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I hope you don't plan on letting this insult to your house slide!" {n}Abelard is glaring at the crowd before you, furious.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « J'espère que vous ne comptez pas laisser passer cette insulte faite à votre maison ! » {n}s'exclame Abélard en regardant la foule d'un air furieux.{/n}

languages.text: "Hoffentlich habt Ihr nicht vor, diese Beleidigung Eures Haues hinzunehmen!" {n}Abelard funkelt die Menge vor dir zornig an.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I hope you don't plan on letting this insult to your house slide!" {n}Abelard is glaring at the crowd before you, furious.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Hoffentlich habt Ihr nicht vor, diese Beleidigung Eures Haues hinzunehmen!" {n}Abelard funkelt die Menge vor dir zornig an.{/n}

languages.text: "Umarım hanenize yöneltilmiş bu hakareti sineye çekme niyetiniz yoktur!" {n}Abelard, öfke saçarak önündeki kalabalığa bakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I hope you don't plan on letting this insult to your house slide!" {n}Abelard is glaring at the crowd before you, furious.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Umarım hanenize yönelmiş bu hakareti görmezden gelmeyi planlamıyorsunuzdur!" {n}Abelard önündeki kalabalığa öfkeyle bakıyor.{/n}
